memories.memory: Age: 68 years old, former heavy smoker, can only walk 9 holes on golf course due to limitations
Diagnosis: COPD mixed type (chronic bronchitis + emphysema), diagnosed 2023 via spirometry, lung function 60% predicted
Comorbidities: Anxiety, no other medical problems
Medication: Anoro - [dosage unknown] - [documentation unknown] - [timing unknown], Ventolin - [dosage unknown] - [documentation unknown] - [timing unknown]

Medication: Anoro - 1x per day - [documentation unknown] - daily maintenance, Ventolin - as needed - [documentation unknown] - rescue inhaler, max 6x per day then consult GP but patient sometimes forgets this rule
Living situation: Married, children moved out, recently became grandfather
Support: Annual COPD check with practice nurse, sees mental health practice nurse for anxiety, excellent family support
Goal-1: Increase daily steps to 10,000 per day by walking extra round around the block and more walking on golf course. Support: app reminders and motivation via check-ins.
Goal-2: Work on anxiety management through breathing exercises and recognizing tension early. Support: combine with POH GGZ sessions and app guidance.
Hans wants to ask POH about physiotherapy referral and insurance coverage for COPD at next appointment

reminders.message: ZLM herhaling en doelevaluatie met Hans - 3 maanden na eerste doelgesprek
Follow-up: Hoe gaat het met Hans na de ZLM evaluatie?
